about_the_game:
A museum in need of security...
A person in need of money...
An odd occurrence...



The Third Shift is coming soon! But while you wait, perhaps you'd like a taste for things to come? If so, please try out this lengthy demo with roughly 2 hours of content.

Find out what's causing trouble in the Body Exhibit, and go for a swim with Bertha in the Aquarium.



For those that have played the demo before, this covers the body exhibit and the aquarium just like before. So as a heads up, you may not want to play it again as it is something you have already seen (Save for the updates and new coat of paint we put on areas) so please play at your own risk. And as always, if you find something wrong with the game or if something breaks, please feel free to reach out and let us know and we'll do our best to fix it swiftly, thank you!

CONTROLS:
Directional Keys / WASD to move
Z and X for A and B Buttons
ESC to exit game
M for Menu
I for Inventory
Limited Gamepad Support is available

name: The Third Shift Demo
short_description: A First/Second/Third person Game Boy styled horror adventure!
